sect1.title: Organization
sect1.para: This book is divided into the following chapters:
This chapter contains essential information which is needed to understand the rest of the book.

This chapter covers packages that help with running binaries on an LFS system that have not been compiled on that system. It does not cover 32-bit binary support on 64-bit. If that is what you are looking for, please read MLFS.
This chapter covers packages from the Hypr/Hyprland ecosystem, including Hyprland itself.
This chapter covers how to install the dependencies of i3, and how to install i3 itself.
This chapter covers the SVR4-style tools, some coming from the Heirloom project.
This chapter covers packages which allow you to emulate older computer hardware.
The Appendices present information which doesn't belong in the body of book; they are included as reference material. The glossary of acronyms is a handy feature.
